sense.def:
The possession of something
je dejstvo, da nekdo nekaj ima ali je lastnik nečesa.

seg.quote: Freedom depended on the possession of land.
The possession of a degree does not guarantee you a job.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in someone's possession
, nekdo tisto ima. Kadar je nekdo
in possession of something
, ga ima tisto v oblasti;

cit.quote: biti v lasti; imeti v lasti

seg.quote: I had in my possession a portion of the money.
The document came into the possession of the Daily Mail.
MacDonald has been in possession of the letter for some weeks.

sense.def:
One's possessions
so stvari, katerih lastnik je nekdo ali ki jih nekdo ima pri sebi.
